Classes

The following classes are available globally.

  • TargetAction

    The TargetAction class bridges the gap between Swift closures and the common Cocoa target (id)/action (SEL) paradigm. Construct a TargetAction with a no-argument or single-argument callback closure. Then, use the target and action properties of the TargetAction instance as you would normally anywhere Cocoa calls for a target/action.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class TargetAction
  • DefaultApplicationSettingsProvider

    The default implementation of the ApplicationSettingsProvider protocol. Uses NSUserDefaults under the hood.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class DefaultApplicationSettingsProvider: ApplicationSettingsProvider
  • DefaultApplicationSettingsStorage

    The default implementation of the ApplicationSettingsStorage protocol. Uses NSUserDefaults under the hood.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class DefaultApplicationSettingsStorage: DefaultApplicationSettingsProvider, ApplicationSettingsStorage
  • DefaultApplicationSettings

    An implementation of the ApplicationSettingsWriter class that uses NSUserDefaults under the hood.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class DefaultApplicationSettings: ApplicationSettingsWriter
  • DictionaryApplicationSettingsProvider

    An ApplicationSettingsProviderimplementation that takes its values from an NSDictionary instance passed to the constructor.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class DictionaryApplicationSettingsProvider: ApplicationSettingsProvider
  • MutableDictionaryApplicationSettingsStorage

    An ApplicationSettingsStorage implementation that uses as a backing store the NSMutableDictionary instance passed to the constructor.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class MutableDictionaryApplicationSettingsStorage: DictionaryApplicationSettingsProvider, ApplicationSettingsStorage
  • ApplicationSettingsWriter

    Provides functions for reading and writing ApplicationSettingsStorage values in a type-safe way.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class ApplicationSettingsWriter: ApplicationSettingsReader, ApplicationSettingsStorage
  • ApplicationSettingsReader

    Provides functions for reading values from an ApplicationSettingsProvider instance in a type-safe way.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class ApplicationSettingsReader: ApplicationSettingsProvider
